CSGO is an excellent game. It would be the best game ever if Valve fixed the anticheat, but still incredible. Remember, it's a game!
Теперь то я знаю кто я, откуда и какие у меня болезни.

Honestly i started like any other habit, healthy and in small doses but eventually it grew to be an addiction and not a good one it started off so innocent i would play with my friends and have so much fun but then everything turned dark and in one swift motion the game i loved play turned into the game i hated the most but for some reason like most abusive relationships i still came back thinking of the good times i used to have i dont really know what changed in me or maybe its the game but i wouldnt recommend this game to anyone i dont wish this fate on my worst enemy counterstrike we have had so many good memories but everything has turned so bitter and i just cant stop and im thinking about calling for help. im here writing this post competitive match and even though i won i dont feel like i deserve it and i wish i could make it stop.
fun game to play alone and with friends
